metadata.title: CVE-2023-29458 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Duktape is an 3rd-party embeddable JavaScript engine, with a focus onportability and compact footprint. When adding too many values in valstackJavaScript will crash. This issue occurs due to bug in Duktape 2.6 which isan 3rd-party solution that we use.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
